item.title: Annotations and Aspects in Java
item.description: I’ve written a sample project with an annotation and an aspect to intercept it and decorate it. The code provides a way of doing try|catch, specifying an exception to be caught. The source code is available here In the process This has taken me approximately one hour to prepare the spike and half more to refactor and massage a bit. If you want to see the raw details, the refactor has been committed step by step (the spike hasn’t).
